# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_ENGINE_API_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_engine_api STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_engine_api
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/service/engine
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_engine_api
        LINK_PUBLIC
        minecpp_stream
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_api_schema
        minecpp_event
        minecpp_game
        libmb
        fmt::fmt
        spdlog::spdlog
)
